00048 /* Private constants ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00049 /** @defgroup SPI_LCD_Private_Define SPI LCD private definitions
00050   * @{
00051   */
00052 #if (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_NORMAL)
00053   #define EC (320)
00054   #define EP (240)
00055   #define MAC (0x60)
00056 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_LEFT_90)
00057   #define EC (240)
00058   #define EP (320)
00059   #define MAC (0x00)
00060 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_RIGHT_90)
00061   #define EC (240)
00062   #define EP (320)
00063   #define MAC (0xC0)
00064 #elif (LCD_DIRECTION == LCD_ROTATE_180)
00065   #define EC (320)
00066   #define EP (240)
00067   #define MAC (0xA0)
00068 #endif
00069 /**
00070   * @}
00071   */
00072 
00073 /* Private variables ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00074 /** @defgroup SPI_LCD_Private_Variable SPI LCD private variables
00075   * @{
00076   */
00077 static u16 Color_Text = 0x0000;  // default: Black
00078 static u16 Color_Back = 0xFFFF;  // default: White
00079 /**
00080   * @}
00081   */
00082 
00083 /* Private function prototypes -----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00084 static void _delay(u32 nCount);

00087 /** @defgroup EBI_LCD_Exported_Functions EBI LCD exported functions
00088   * @{
00089   */
00090 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00091   * @brief  Initialize peripherals used by the SPI LCD driver.
00092   * @retval None
00093   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00094 void LCD_Init(void)
00095 {
00096   /* !!! NOTICE !!!
00097      Notice that the local variable (structure) did not have an initial value.
00098      Please confirm that there are no missing members in the parameter settings below in this function.
00099   */
00100   SPI_InitTypeDef  SPI_InitStructure;
00101 
00102   /*  Enable AFIO clock                                                                                     */
00103   /*  Enable EBI & EBI CS port clock                                                                        */
00104   CKCU_PeripClockConfig_TypeDef CKCUClock = {{0}};
00105   #if (LCD_SPI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00106   LCD_SPI_RST_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00107   #endif
00108   #if (LCD_SPI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00109   LCD_SPI_BL_CLK(CKCUClock)  = 1;
00110   #endif
00111   LCD_SPI_SEL_CLK(CKCUClock) = 1;
00112   LCD_SPI_CLK(CKCUClock)     = 1;
00113   CKCUClock.Bit.AFIO         = 1;
00114   CKCU_PeripClockConfig(CKCUClock, ENABLE);
00115 
00116   #if defined(USE_HT32F50343) || defined(USE_HT32F65240_SK)
00117   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00118   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SCK_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SCK_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00119   GPIO_DriveConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DV_8MA);
00120   #endif
00121 
00122   /* Configure SPI pins, SEL, SCK, MISO ,MOSI, BL & RESET                                                   */
00123   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_MODE);
00124   #if (LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ENABLE == 1)
00125   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN);
00126   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_SEL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_SEL_AFIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00127   #endif
00128   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_SCK_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_SCK_AFIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_SCK_AFIO_MODE);
00129   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_MISO_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_MISO_AFIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_MISO_AFIO_MODE);
00130   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_MODE);
00131   #if (LCD_SPI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00132   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_BL_AFIO_MODE);
00133   #endif
00134   #if (LCD_SPI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00135   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_PIN, LCD_SPI_RST_AFIO_MODE);
00136   #endif
00137 
00138   /* Set output data of BL & RESET as high                                                                  */
00139   #if (LCD_SPI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00140   //GPIO_SetOutBits(LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_PORT, LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_PIN);
00141   #endif
00142   #if (LCD_SPI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00143   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00144   #endif
00145 
00146   /* Configure the direction of BL & RESET as output mode                                                   */
00147   #if (LCD_SPI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00148   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00149   #endif
00150   #if (LCD_SPI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00151   GPIO_DirectionConfig(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_PIN, GPIO_DIR_OUT);
00152   #endif
00153 
00154   /* SPI Configuration                                                                                      */
00155   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_Mode = SPI_MASTER;
00156   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FIFO = SPI_FIFO_DISABLE;
00157   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_DataLength = SPI_DATALENGTH_8;
00158   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELMode = SPI_SEL_SOFTWARE;
00159   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_SELPolarity = SPI_SELPOLARITY_LOW;
00160   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_FirstBit = SPI_FIRSTBIT_MSB;
00161   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPOL = SPI_CPOL_HIGH;
00162   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_CPHA = SPI_CPHA_SECOND;
00163   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_RxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00164   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_TxFIFOTriggerLevel = 0;
00165   #if (LIBCFG_MAX_SPEED > 48000000)
00166   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 4;
00167   #else
00168   SPI_InitStructure.SPI_ClockPrescaler = 2;
00169   #endif
00170   SPI_Init(LCD_SPI, &SPI_InitStructure);
00171 
00172   #if (!LIBCFG_SPI_NO_MULTI_MASTER)
00173   SPI_SELOutputCmd(LCD_SPI, ENABLE);
00174   #endif
00175 
00176   SPI_Cmd(LCD_SPI, ENABLE);
00177 }
00178 
00179 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00180   * @brief  Configures the LCD by the SPI lcd driver.
00181   * @retval None
00182   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00183 void LCD_Config(void)
00184 {
00185   _delay(10);
00186 
00187   /* RESET LCD                                                                                              */
00188   #if (LCD_SPI_RST_UNUSE == 0)
00189   GPIO_ClearOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00190   _delay(5);
00191   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_RST_GPIO_PIN);
00192   _delay(10);
00193   #endif
00194 
00195   /* Driving ability Setting                                                                                */
00196   LCD_WriteReg(0xE2, 0x00);
00197   LCD_WriteReg(0xE4, 0x01);
00198   LCD_WriteReg(0xE5, 0x10);
00199   LCD_WriteReg(0xE6, 0x01);
00200   LCD_WriteReg(0xE7, 0x10);
00201   LCD_WriteReg(0xE8, 0x70);
00202   LCD_WriteReg(0xF2, 0x00);
00203   LCD_WriteReg(0xEA, 0x00);
00204   LCD_WriteReg(0xEB, 0x20);
00205   LCD_WriteReg(0xEC, 0x3C);
00206   LCD_WriteReg(0xED, 0xC8);
00207   LCD_WriteReg(0xE9, 0x38);
00208   LCD_WriteReg(0xF1, 0x01);
00209   LCD_WriteReg(0x2E, 0x89);
00210   LCD_WriteReg(0x29, 0x8F);
00211   LCD_WriteReg(0x2B, 0x02);
00212 
00213   /* Gamma 2.2 Setting                                                                                      */
00214   LCD_WriteReg(0x40, 0x00);
00215   LCD_WriteReg(0x41, 0x00);
00216   LCD_WriteReg(0x42, 0x00);
00217   LCD_WriteReg(0x43, 0x15);
00218   LCD_WriteReg(0x44, 0x13);
00219   LCD_WriteReg(0x45, 0x3f);
00220   LCD_WriteReg(0x47, 0x55);
00221   LCD_WriteReg(0x48, 0x00);
00222   LCD_WriteReg(0x49, 0x12);
00223   LCD_WriteReg(0x4A, 0x19);
00224   LCD_WriteReg(0x4B, 0x19);
00225   LCD_WriteReg(0x4C, 0x16);
00226   LCD_WriteReg(0x50, 0x00);
00227   LCD_WriteReg(0x51, 0x2c);
00228   LCD_WriteReg(0x52, 0x2a);
00229   LCD_WriteReg(0x53, 0x3F);
00230   LCD_WriteReg(0x54, 0x3F);
00231   LCD_WriteReg(0x55, 0x3F);
00232   LCD_WriteReg(0x56, 0x2a);
00233   LCD_WriteReg(0x57, 0x7e);
00234   LCD_WriteReg(0x58, 0x09);
00235   LCD_WriteReg(0x59, 0x06);
00236   LCD_WriteReg(0x5A, 0x06);
00237   LCD_WriteReg(0x5B, 0x0d);
00238   LCD_WriteReg(0x5C, 0x1F);
00239   LCD_WriteReg(0x5D, 0xFF);
00240 
00241   /* Power Voltage Setting                                                                                  */
00242   LCD_WriteReg(0x1B, 0x1A);
00243   LCD_WriteReg(0x1A, 0x02);
00244   LCD_WriteReg(0x24, 0x61);
00245   LCD_WriteReg(0x25, 0x5C);
00246 
00247   /* VCOM offset                                                                                            */
00248   LCD_WriteReg(0x18, 0x36);
00249   LCD_WriteReg(0x19, 0x01);
00250   LCD_WriteReg(0x23, 0x62);
00251   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x88);
00252   _delay(5);
00253   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x80);
00254   _delay(5);
00255   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0x90);
00256   _delay(5);
00257   LCD_WriteReg(0x1F, 0xD4);
00258   _delay(5);
00259 
00260   /* 262k or 65k color selection                                                                            */
00261   LCD_WriteReg(0x17, 0x05);
00262 
00263   LCD_WriteReg(0x36, 0x09);
00264 
00265   /* Display ON Setting                                                                                     */
00266   LCD_WriteReg(0x28, 0x38);
00267   _delay(40);
00268   LCD_WriteReg(0x28, 0x3C);
00269 
00270   /* Set GRAM Area                                                                                          */
00271   // Column Start
00272   LCD_WriteReg(0x02, 0x00);
00273   LCD_WriteReg(0x03, 0x00);
00274 
00275   // Column End
00276   LCD_WriteReg(0x04, ((EC - 1) & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00277   LCD_WriteReg(0x05, ((EC - 1) & 0xFF));
00278 
00279   // Row Start
00280   LCD_WriteReg(0x06, 0x00);
00281   LCD_WriteReg(0x07, 0x00);
00282 
00283   // Row End
00284   LCD_WriteReg(0x08, ((EP - 1) & 0xFF00) >> 8);
00285   LCD_WriteReg(0x09, ((EP - 1) & 0xFF));
00286 
00287   /* Show Direction                                                                                         */
00288   LCD_WriteReg(0x16, MAC);
00289 
00290   LCD_Clear(Black);
00291 
00292   _delay(200);
00293 
00294   /* Turn on the back light                                                                                 */
00295   #if (LCD_SPI_BL_ENABLE == 1)
00296   GPIO_SetOutBits(GPIO_PORT[LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_ID], LCD_SPI_BL_GPIO_PIN);
00297   #endif
00298 }
00299 
00300 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00301   * @brief  Write value to the selected LCD register.
00302   * @param  LCD_Reg_Index: address of the selected register.
00303   * @param  LCD_Reg_Value: value of to write the selected register.
00304   * @retval None
00305   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00306 void LCD_WriteReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index, u32 LCD_Reg_Value)
00307 {
00308   LCD_WriteRegIndex(LCD_Reg_Index);
00309 
00310   /* Select the SPI LCD                                                                                     */
00311   LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE();
00312   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00313   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00314   /* Send command                                                                                           */
00315   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, START_BYTE | LCD_WRITE_REG);
00316 
00317   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00318   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00319   /* Send number of register                                                                                */
00320   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, LCD_Reg_Value >> 8);
00321   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00322   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00323   /* Send number of register                                                                                */
00324   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, (LCD_Reg_Value & 0xFF));
00325 
00326   /* Wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00327   while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
00328 
00329   /* Deselect the SPI LCD                                                                                   */
00330   LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE();
00331 }
00332 
00333 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00334   * @brief  Set the cursor position.
00335   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00336   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00337   * @retval None
00338   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00339 void LCD_StarterSet(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location)
00340 {
00341   LCD_WriteReg(REG6, ((X_Location >> 8) & 0xff));
00342   LCD_WriteReg(REG7, (X_Location & 0xff));
00343 
00344   LCD_WriteReg(REG2, ((Y_Location >> 8) & 0xff));
00345   LCD_WriteReg(REG3, (Y_Location & 0xff));
00346 }
00347 
00348 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00349   * @brief  Prepare to write data to LCD RAM.
00350   * @retval None
00351   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00352 void LCD_WriteRAMPrior(void)
00353 {
00354   LCD_WriteRegIndex(REG34);
00355 }
00356 
00357 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00358   * @brief  Write to the LCD RAM.
00359   * @param  RGB_Set: the pixel color in RGB mode (5-6-5).
00360   * @retval None
00361   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00362 void LCD_WriteRAM(u32 RGB_Set)
00363 {
00364   /* Select the SPI LCD                                                                                     */
00365   LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE();
00366 
00367   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00368   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00369   /* Send command                                                                                           */
00370   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, START_BYTE | LCD_WRITE_REG);
00371 
00372   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00373   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00374   /* Send number of register                                                                                */
00375   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, RGB_Set >> 8);
00376   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00377   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00378   /* Send number of register                                                                                */
00379   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, (RGB_Set & 0xFF));
00380 
00381   /* Wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00382   while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
00383 
00384   /* Deselect the SPI LCD                                                                                   */
00385   LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE();
00386 }
00387 
00388 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00389   * @brief  Clear the whole LCD.
00390   * @param  Color: the color to be the background.
00391   * @retval None
00392   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00393 void LCD_Clear(u16 Color)
00394 {
00395   u32 i = LCD_Height * LCD_Width;
00396 
00397   LCD_StarterSet(0, 0);
00398 
00399   /* Prepare to write GRAM                                                                                  */
00400   LCD_WriteRAMPrior();
00401 
00402   while (i--) LCD_WriteRAM(Color);
00403 }
00404 
00405 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00406   * @brief  Set the background color.
00407   * @param  Color: background color of RGB 5-6-5.
00408   * @retval None
00409   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00410 void LCD_BackColorSet(u16 Color)
00411 {
00412   Color_Back = Color;
00413 }
00414 
00415 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00416   * @brief  Set the text color.
00417   * @param  Color: text color of RGB 5-6-5.
00418   * @retval None
00419   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00420 void LCD_TextColorSet(u16 Color)
00421 {
00422   Color_Text = Color;
00423 }
00424 
00425 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00426   * @brief  Display one character (16 dots width, 24 dots height).
00427   * @param  Line_Num: Where to display the character, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00428   * @param  Column: start column address.
00429   * @param  Ascii: character ascii code, must be between 0x20 and 0x7E.
00430   * @retval None
00431   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00432 void LCD_CharDisplay(u32 Line_Num, u32 Column, u32 Ascii)
00433 {
00434   Ascii -= 32;
00435   LCD_CharDraw(Line_Num, Column, (u16 *)&ASCII_Font_Table[Ascii * 24]);
00436 }
00437 
00438 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00439   * @brief  Disable the Display.
00440   * @retval None
00441   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00442 void LCD_DisplayOff(void)
00443 {
00444   /* Display Off                                                                                            */
00445   LCD_WriteReg(REG40, 0);
00446 }
00447 
00448 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00449   * @brief  Enable the Display.
00450   * @retval None
00451   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00452 void LCD_DisplayOn(void)
00453 {
00454   /* Display On                                                                                             */
00455   LCD_WriteReg(REG40, 0x3C);
00456 }
00457 
00458 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00459   * @brief  Display the maximum 20 characters on one line.
00460   * @param  Line_Num: Where to display the character, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00461   * @param  Sptr: point to the string data.
00462   * @retval None
00463   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00464 void LCD_StringLineDisplay(u32 Line_Num, char *Sptr)
00465 {
00466   u32 i = 0;
00467   u16 reference_column = 0;
00468 
00469   /* Send character by character on LCD                                                                     */
00470   while ((*Sptr != 0) & (i < 20))
00471   {
00472     LCD_CharDisplay(Line_Num, reference_column, *Sptr);
00473     /* Increment the column position by 16, because character is size of 16x24                              */
00474     reference_column += 16;
00475     /* Point to the next character                                                                          */
00476     Sptr++;
00477 
00478     /* Increase the character counter                                                                       */
00479     i++;
00480   }
00481 }
00482 
00483 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00484   * @brief  Draw one character.
00485   * @param  X_Location: the position of display line, should be LINE0 ~ LINE9.
00486   * @param  Y_Location: the start position of character.
00487   * @param  Cptr: point to font data of character.
00488   * @retval None
00489   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00490 void LCD_CharDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u16 *Cptr)
00491 {
00492   u32 xid = X_Location;
00493   u32 i = 0, j = 0;
00494 
00495   LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00496 
00497   for (i = 0; i < Font_Raw; i++)
00498   {
00499     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00500     for (j = 0; j < Font_Column; j++)
00501     {
00502       if ((Cptr[i] & (1 << j)) == 0x00)
00503       {
00504         LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Back);
00505       }
00506       else
00507       {
00508         LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Text);
00509       }
00510     }
00511     xid++;
00512     LCD_StarterSet(xid, Y_Location);
00513   }
00514 }
00515 
00516 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00517   * @brief  Display a line.
00518   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00519   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00520   * @param  Length: line length.
00521   * @param  Direction: line direction.
00522   *   This parameter can be one of the following values:
00523   *     @arg Vertical
00524   *     @arg Horizontal
00525   * @retval None
00526   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00527 void LCD_LineDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Length, u32 Direction)
00528 {
00529   s32 i = 0;
00530 
00531   LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00532 
00533   if (Direction == Horizontal)
00534   {
00535     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00536     for (i = Length; i > 0; i--)
00537     {
00538       LCD_WriteRAM(Color_Text);
00539     }
00540   }
00541   else
00542   {
00543     for (i = Length; i > 0; i--)
00544     {
00545       LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00546       X_Location++;
00547       LCD_StarterSet(X_Location, Y_Location);
00548     }
00549   }
00550 }
00551 
00552 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00553   * @brief  Display a circle.
00554   * @param  X_Location: specify the X position.
00555   * @param  Y_Location: specify the Y position.
00556   * @param  Radius: radius of the circle.
00557   * @retval None
00558   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00559 void LCD_CircleDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Radius)
00560 {
00561   s32  DV;  // Decision Variable
00562   u32  X_Value;      // Current X Value
00563   u32  Y_Value;      // Current Y Value
00564 
00565   DV = 3 - (Radius << 1);
00566   X_Value = 0;
00567   Y_Value = Radius;
00568 
00569   while (X_Value <= Y_Value)
00570   {
00571     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + X_Value, Y_Location + Y_Value);
00572     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00573 
00574     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + X_Value, Y_Location - Y_Value);
00575     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00576 
00577     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - X_Value, Y_Location + Y_Value);
00578     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00579 
00580     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - X_Value, Y_Location - Y_Value);
00581     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00582 
00583     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + Y_Value, Y_Location + X_Value);
00584     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00585 
00586     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location + Y_Value, Y_Location - X_Value);
00587     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00588 
00589     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - Y_Value, Y_Location + X_Value);
00590     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00591 
00592     LCD_StarterSet(X_Location - Y_Value, Y_Location - X_Value);
00593     LCD_WriteRAMWord(Color_Text);
00594 
00595     if (DV < 0)
00596     {
00597       DV += (X_Value << 2) + 6;
00598     }
00599     else
00600     {
00601       DV += ((X_Value - Y_Value) << 2) + 10;
00602       Y_Value--;
00603     }
00604     X_Value++;
00605   }
00606 }
00607 
00608 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00609   * @brief  Draw a rectangle.
00610   * @param  X_Location: X position.
00611   * @param  Y_Location: Y position.
00612   * @param  Height: rectangle height.
00613   * @param  Width: rectangle width.
00614   * @retval None
00615   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00616 void LCD_RectDraw(u32 X_Location, u32 Y_Location, u32 Height, u32 Width)
00617 {
00618   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location, Width, Horizontal);
00619   LCD_LineDraw((X_Location + Height), Y_Location, Width, Horizontal);
00620 
00621   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location, Height, Vertical);
00622   LCD_LineDraw(X_Location, Y_Location + Width - 1, Height, Vertical);
00623 }
00624 
00625 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00626   * @brief  Draw a picture.
00627   * @param  X_Location: X position.
00628   * @param  Y_Location: Y position.
00629   * @param  Height: rectangle height.
00630   * @param  Width: rectangle width.
00631   * @param  Pptr: point to pixel data of picture.
00632   * @retval None
00633   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00634 void LCD_PicDraw(u8 X_Location, u16 Y_Location, u8 Height, u16 Width, uc8 *Pptr)
00635 {
00636   u32 xid = 0;
00637   u32 ImgAdds = 0;
00638   u32 yid = 0;
00639   u32 i = 0, j = 0, color = 0;
00640 
00641   xid = Height + X_Location;
00642   yid = Y_Location;
00643   LCD_StarterSet(xid, yid);
00644 
00645   for (i = 0; i < Height; i++)
00646   {
00647     LCD_WriteRAMPrior();  // Get ready to write GRAM
00648 
00649     for (j = 0; j < Width; j++)
00650     {
00651       ImgAdds = (i * Width * 2) + (j * 2);
00652 
00653       color = Pptr[ImgAdds] << 8 | (Pptr[ImgAdds + 1]);
00654 
00655       LCD_WriteRAM(color);
00656     }
00657     xid--;
00658     LCD_StarterSet(xid, yid);
00659   }
00660 }
00661 
00662 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00663   * @brief  Write 1 word to the LCD RAM.
00664   * @param  RGB_Set: the pixel color in RGB mode (5-6-5).
00665   * @retval None
00666   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00667 void LCD_WriteRAMWord(u32 RGB_Set)
00668 {
00669   LCD_WriteRAMPrior();
00670 
00671   LCD_WriteRAM(RGB_Set);
00672 }
00673 
00674 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00675   * @brief  Set Display Area.
00676   * @param  Column:
00677   * @param  Page:
00678   * @param  Height:
00679   * @param  Width:
00680   * @retval None
00681   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00682 void LCD_SetDisplayArea(u16 Column, u16 Page, u16 Height, u16 Width)
00683 {
00684   LCD_WriteReg(REG2, (Page >> 8) & 0xFF);
00685   LCD_WriteReg(REG3, (Page & 0xFF));
00686   LCD_WriteReg(REG4, ((Page + Width-1) >> 8) & 0xFF);
00687   LCD_WriteReg(REG5, (Page + Width-1) & 0xFF);
00688   LCD_WriteReg(REG6, (Column >> 8) & 0xFF);
00689   LCD_WriteReg(REG7, (Column & 0xFF));
00690   LCD_WriteReg(REG8, ((Column + Height-1) >> 8) & 0xFF);
00691   LCD_WriteReg(REG9, (Column + Height-1) & 0xFF);
00692 }
00693 /**
00694   * @}
00695   */
00696 
00697 
00698 /* Private functions ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00699 /** @defgroup SPI_LCD_Private_Functions SPI LCD private functions
00700   * @{
00701   */
00702 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00703   * @brief  Inserts a delay time.
00704   * @param  nCount: specifies the delay time length.
00705   * @retval None
00706   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00707 static void _delay(u32 nCount)
00708 {
00709   vu32 i;
00710 
00711   for (i = 0; i < 10000 * nCount; i++)
00712   {
00713   }
00714 }
00715 
00716 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00717   * @brief  Select the LCD register which is to be accessed.
00718   * @param  LCD_Reg_Index: address of the selected register.
00719   * @retval None
00720   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00721 void LCD_WriteRegIndex(u32 LCD_Reg_Index)
00722 {
00723   /* Select the SPI LCD                                                                                     */
00724   LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE();
00725 
00726   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00727   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00728   /* Send command                                                                                           */
00729   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, START_BYTE | SET_INDEX);
00730 
00731   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00732   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00733   /* Send number of register                                                                                */
00734   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, LCD_Reg_Index);
00735 
00736   /* Wait for transmission finished                                                                         */
00737   while (SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_BUSY));
00738 
00739   /* Deselect the SPI LCD                                                                                   */
00740   LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE();
00741 }
00742 
00743 /*********************************************************************************************************//**
00744   * @brief  Read the selected LCD Register.
00745   * @param  LCD_Reg_Index: address of the selected register.
00746   * @retval Value of the selected register.
00747   ***********************************************************************************************************/
00748 u16 LCD_ReadReg(u32 LCD_Reg_Index)
00749 {
00750   u16 tmp = 0;
00751 
00752   LCD_WriteRegIndex(LCD_Reg_Index);
00753 
00754   /* Select the SPI LCD                                                                                     */
00755   LCD_SEL_CMD_ACTIVE();
00756 
00757   /* Receive dummy data in Rx & Rx shift                                                                    */
00758   SPI_ReceiveData(LCD_SPI);
00759   SPI_ReceiveData(LCD_SPI);
00760 
00761   /* Check on LCD_SPI Tx Buffer empty                                                                       */
00762   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_TXBE));
00763   /* Send command                                                                                           */
00764   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, START_BYTE | LCD_READ_REG);
00765   /* Check on LCD_SPI Rx Buffer data reception                                                              */
00766   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_RXBNE));
00767   /* Receive dummy data                                                                                     */
00768   SPI_ReceiveData(LCD_SPI);
00769 
00770   /* Release the control of MOSI in order to receive data in 3 wire mode                                    */
00771   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN, AFIO_MODE_DEFAULT);
00772 
00773   /* Send dummy data in order to receive the data we want                                                   */
00774   SPI_SendData(LCD_SPI, 0xFF);
00775   while (!SPI_GetFlagStatus(LCD_SPI, SPI_FLAG_RXBNE));
00776   tmp = SPI_ReceiveData(LCD_SPI);
00777 
00778   /* Deselect the SPI LCD                                                                                   */
00779   LCD_SEL_CMD_INACTIVE();
00780 
00781   /* Recover the control of MOSI                                                                            */
00782   HT32F_DVB_GPxConfig(LCD_SPI_MOSI_GPIO_ID, LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_PIN , LCD_SPI_MOSI_AFIO_MODE);
00783 
00784   return tmp;
00785 }
00786 /**
00787   * @}
00788   */
00789 
00790 
00791 /**
00792   * @}
00793   */
00794 
00795 /**
00796   * @}
00797   */
00798 
00799 /**
00800   * @}
00801   */
